Astro Gold is the professional-level astrology iPhone and iPad app that you have been waiting for! This app provides high quality software on a mobile device. Along with high precision calculations you can also read professional astrological interpretations. Astro Gold features Natal, Transit, Progression and Synastry interpretations, making astrology on-the-go even easier, as well as the option to store chart files in iCloud Drive which makes it possible to have the same chart files across multiple iOS devices, as well as the advanced macOS version of Astro Gold. The app is clean, clear and precise, and uses the latest Swiss Ephemeris and ACS Atlas files. If you love astrology and want a professional astrology app then look no further.Â If you are a user of the Solar Fire PC program then you can exchange chart files between this app and your Solar Fire program via email or iTunes file sharing. Charts â€¢ Cast new Natal charts â€¢ Cast Solar Return charts â€¢ Cast Lunar Return charts â€¢ Cast Secondary Progressed charts â€¢ Cast Solar Arc Directed charts â€¢ Cast Relationship or Composite charts â€¢ Save charts to file and open charts from file â€¢ Charts may be saved either as local device files or to iCloud Drive â€¢ Chart saved to iCloud Drive are automatically available to any other iOS device on which you install this app, as well as the advanced astrology macOS version of Astro Gold. â€¢ Edit charts â€¢ Re-open a recently used chart â€¢ Import and export chart files via email or by iTunes File Sharing (not necessary if you use iCloud Drive) â€¢ Chart files are fully compatible and interchangeable with AstroGold macOS version and "Solar Fire" desktop astrology program for PC â€¢ Select either 1, 2 or 3 charts at a time for display â€¢ Print charts or send chart images by email Display â€¢ Zooming/panning display to view hi-res wheels and grids â€¢ Single Chart Wheels, Bi-Wheels, Tri-Wheels â€¢ Aspect grid with aspects of longitude and declination â€¢ Synastry grids â€¢ Basic chart details report â€¢ Essential dignities report â€¢ Chart aspects report (sorted by planet or by orb) â€¢ Interpretations reports â€¢ Transits listings with many customisable options, including â—¦ time span â—¦ transiting planet/s and radix planet/s â—¦ aspects â—¦ enter/leave orb events â—¦ planetary stations â—¦ house ingresses â—¦ sign ingresses â€¢ Professional Reports - (PDF format, shareable - via in-app purchase) â—¦ Birth Reports â—¦ Predictive Reports (One Year) â—¦ Relationship Reports â—¦ Child Reports (Natal) â—¦ Birthday Reports (Solar Return) â—¦ Pet Reports Settings â€¢ Displayed chart points (42 points available) â€¢ Aspected chart points â€¢ Aspect set with editable aspect orbs, including different applying/separating orbs â€¢ Wheel display optionsÂ  â—¦ planet colors â—¦ sign colors â—¦ wheel styles (many supplied styles to choose from) â—¦ proportional houses on or off â—¦ aspect lines & glyphs on or off â€¢ Chart calculation options â—¦ zodiac type (tropical or 7 different sidereal zodiacs including Fagan-Allen, Lahiri, DeLuce, Raman, UshaShashi, Krishnamurti and Djwhal Khul) â—¦ house system (25+ systems available including Campanus, Koch, Meridian, Morinus, Placidus, Porphyry, Regiomontanus, Topocentric, Equal, Zero Aries, Solar Sign, Whole Sign, Bhava, Alcabitius, PF on 1st, Asc in 1st, Vertex on 7th, + Sun, Moon, Mercury, Venus, Mars, Jupiter, Saturn, Neptune, Pluto and Node on 1st.) â—¦ lunar node type â—¦ part of fortune type â—¦ lunar parallax correction â—¦ black moon type â—¦ angle progressions type â€¢ Your home location (for transits charts) * Dark Mode Always On, Always Off or Automatic Atlas â€¢ Uses full ACS Atlas, with 250,000+ locations from around the world, and comprehensive world timezone history Calculations â€¢ Uses Swiss Ephemeris for state of the art precision in astronomical calculations - ephemeris range 1200 BC to 2400 AD. iOS Advanced Feature â€¢ Invoke menu on app icon to cast a new chart, view current transits chart wheel or basic chart details report
